exec: pm.test("self ref should contain all request params", function () {

header.description: (required) http-signature of the request (cf. https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-cavage-http-signatures/) The keyId must specify the way to get the relevant qualified certificate. It is requested that this identifier is an URL aiming to provide the relevant Qualified Certificate.
(required) Correlation header to be set in a request and retrieved in the relevant response
